lead_paragraph: Brian Rolston and David Clarkson scored power-play goals in the second period for the Devils, who finished their preseason schedule with a 4-3 victory over the Philadelphia Flyers in Newark.
snippet: Brian Rolston and David Clarkson scored power-play goals in the second period for the Devils, who finished their preseason schedule with a 4-3 victory over the Philadelphia Flyers in Newark.
